thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Range Reports Qtrly Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.22

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Range Reports Qtrly Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.22
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Range Resources Corp:
* RANGE ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 RESULTS
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.89 * 2018 CAPITAL BUDGET IS $941 MILLION * PRODUCTION FOR Q1 OF 2018 IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY 2.18 BCFE PER DAY.
* PRODUCTION FOR FULL YEAR 2018 IS EXPECTED TO AVERAGE APPROXIMATELY 2.23 BCFE PER DAY.
* SEES ‍ABOUT $1 BILLION IN CUMULATIVE FREE CASH FLOW FROM 2018 THROUGH 2022 ​
* QTRLY ‍TOTAL REVENUE AND OTHER INCOME $679 MILLION VERSUS $253.5 MILLION
* QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.22 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.16, REVENUE VIEW $627.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* PRODUCTION INCREASED TO 2.0 BCFE PER DAY IN 2017 COMPARED TO 1.5 BCFE PER DAY IN 2016, AN INCREASE OF 30% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
